title: What mains are you afraid of playing against?
body:
Don't think of who you think are toxic to play against, but think more of what you are *afraid* of, like you dread facing a main who is really good at their champion and uses their full potential. Maybe it's not necessarily *unfun* to play against, but its tough to face them.

I'm afraid of those dang {{champion:64}} players who know every little friggen trick they can do. I like how after all the times they nerf him, the Lee sin players just adapted and start doing things like freaking calculating the angle they can kick someone into their entire team and knock them all up, then specifically flashing/ward hopping JUST to get that angle right.

Like wtf, I'm permabanning Lee Sin just because of that lol.
